text: Cláudio Roberto da Silva (born 29 May 1976), commonly known as Cláudio Caçapa or simply Caçapa (), is a Brazilian football coach and former player who played as a central defender. He currently is the head coach of Belgian Pro League club RWD Molenbeek. ==Club career statistics== |- |1996||rowspan="5"|Atlético Mineiro||rowspan="5"|Série A||0||0 |- |1997||6||0 |- |1998||15||0 |- |1999||21||1 |- |2000||19||1 |- |2000–01||rowspan="7"|Olympique Lyonnais||rowspan="2"|Division 1||6||1 |- |2001–02||15||0 |- |2002–03||rowspan="5"|Ligue 1||36||2 |- |2003–04||15||1 |- |2004–05||21||1 |- |2005–06||26||2 |- |2006–07||6||0 |- |2007–08||rowspan="2"|Newcastle United||rowspan="2"|Premier League||19||1 |- |2008–09||6||0 61||2 125||7 25||1 211||10 |} ==International career statistics== |- |2000||1||0 |- |2001||2||0 |- !Total||3||0 |} ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Minas Gerais Category:2001 FIFA Confederations Cup players Category:Premier League players Category:Brazilian football managers
